title: Juvenile detained for murder of roommate in Egmore
Telugu Desam Party wrests Kadapa by repeating 1999 election results
description: Andhra Pradesh’s Telugu Desam party won seven out of 10 Assembly seats in the combined Kadapa district in 2024, which is exactly similar to its achievement in 1999, when it bagged eight out of 11 seats

title: Kerala govt. releases ₹494 crore as part of taking over 90% of losses of Kerala State Electricity Board
description: Kerala government approves release of ₹494.29 crore to KSEB, gives undertaking to Centre to avail of additional borrowing space linked to power sector reforms

title: A choir for all seasons
description: Delhi-based international choir, Capital City Minstrels, has been regaling music lovers for three decades and the festive end-of-season bonhomie is never complete without its concerts

title: Fracas in Left front in Kerala as CPI’s V.S. Sunil Kumar guns for Thrissur Mayor
description: V.S. Sunil Kumar accuses Thrissur Mayor M.K. Varghese of warming up to BJP for his meeting with K. Surendran on Christmas day. Kumar claims that receiving cake from BJP State chief was part of calculated political move

title: U.P. Kisan Samman and Nyay Padayatra is to bring farmers’ concerns to forefront, says Kisan Congress leader
description: He said all national Congress leaders, including Rahul and Priyanka Gandhi, would participate in the proposed yatra

title: Kohli family in Hubballi quietly mourns demise of Manmohan Singh
description: Being close relatives, the Kohli family of Hubballi regularly visited the Singhs in New Delhi. The visits came down subsequently because of the security restrictions

title: Man, two women held for despatching dead body in wooden box in Andhra Pradesh’s West Godavari district
description: West Godavari SP Adnan Nayeem Asmi said the accused hatched a plan to threaten the recipient to grab a piece of land

title: Manmohan Singh was humility personified but undaunted by criticism, says former Principal Secretary T.K.A. Nair
description: T.K.A. Nair says Manmohan Singh had a genuine respect for the people he met

title: Manmohan Singh was the first to make significant efforts for upliftment of marginalised communities: Asaduddin Owaisi
description: Mr. Owaisi expressed deep sorrow at Dr. Singh’s passing. “I stand with those mourning his passing,” he concluded.

title: Anna University sexual assault: Security on campus to be improved, says T.N. Higher Education Minister
description: According to Govi Chezhiaan, around 80% of the CCTV cameras on the campus are working. The overgrown shrubbery on the campus will be removed, said Mr. Chezhiaan, adding that more streetlights will be installed soon
